climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: LUXURY BEDDING: 1 fitted Sheet, 1 flat Sheet and 4 pillowcases. Our LuxClub 6 pc king size sheets set are crafted from a blend of 80% microfiber and 20% rayon made from bamboo, offer a more luxurious and comfortable bedding experience than even the finest Egyptian cotton sheets and pillowcases. With double-brushed polyester microfiber, these king sheets outperform 100% cotton for softness and breathability.

COMFORT - LuxClub 6 piece sheets beat hotel sheets & high thread count luxury sheets. Best cooling sheets with superior breathability. Our bedding sets; 18 inch deep pocket sheets, wrinkle free sheets, silky soft sheets.

BEST BED SHEETS - fabric blended with microfiber & elastic all around our fitted sheets. Our deep pocket sheets have extra deep pockets for memory foam or mattress toppers. Softer than Jersey Sheets & strong while being fade resistant, anti-pill, temperature
The most adorable gift that can decorate your room. It's great for people of all ages, including your parents, your spouse, or your kids. It's a great gift for any time of year!

TOTAL CONFIDENCE & LIFETIME SATISFACTION - If you’re not thrilled with your sheets for any reason, at any point, simply let us know and we will take them back, no questions asked. Add to cart & enjoy the comfort of LuxClub sheets.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hypoallergenic The Fabric blend used in LuxClub sheets gives them a natural defense against allergens. We're all careful about the things we put into our bodies and our skin, so shouldn't we be just as diligent with our sheets? After-all we immerse our faces and bodies in them in every night! Wrinkle Free No harmful chemicals that will wash out over time leaving you with wrinkled sheets down the road. Our sheets are naturally wrinkle free thanks to the nature of our fabric blend and the weaving process. - Super easy care, just wash and tumble dry on low. Soft Some of the softest sheets you'll ever feel even when comparing to the softest cottons. It's not just the fabric we use or the weave, but also factors like thickness, twist, density etc.

Moisture Wicking Any moisture is pulled and dispersed similar to your favorite activewear, but with a much more comfortable feel. Quality Quality, Quality, Quality! From the fabrics we use to the instruments to the factory workers. LuxClub sheets are made to last a lifetime. Cooling Like us, sheets need to breathe. Our sheets do their part helping to regulate body temperature with their breathable cooling feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sheets I’ve had in a long time
reviews.reviewText: I bought these sheets during the July prime sale. I read the numerous great compliments and of course read the ones that were not so complementary. They were a good price on sale and most of the comments on how soft they were, wrinkle free, and most of all that they were cool, made me purchase these. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase. I washed and dried them and they came out of the dryer just fine. Put them on the bed and very little wrinkles. Did I mention how soft they are? Very very soft and light. I am very hot natured and live in Houston Texas which is brutal right now. I suffer from night sweats. I cannot say these are miracle sheets but I can say I’ve had the best sleep in a while because the sheets were indeed cooling and breathable as well as very soft and luxurious feeling . I have sheets that I paid hundreds of dollars for that ate 100% 1,000+ Thread’ ‘hotel’ quality cotton. Those sheets I could take out of the dryer as soon as the dryer stopped and they still looked like they had been rolled in a ball for two or three weeks. Yes they were indeed high-quality combed cotton, but they were heavy and not cooling at all. These sheets I gave a a 5+ rating in every area. I see some comments about the piping is not as pretty or luxurious as it should be or maybe the edging and hem should be thicker and better quality. I found no problems with the stitching. The piping was fine but most of all they gave me great comfort and a good nights cooling sleep and that’s all that matters. I am very happy and satisfied with my purchase.I’m thrilled that the sheets come in a large assortment of colors because I’m going to be buying many more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST SHEETS EVER
reviews.reviewText: These sheets are INCREDIBLE. I have bought 3 different colors and recommend them to everyone that I talk to about sheets. They are the softest sheets I’ve ever slept on and they’re such a good price. They don’t wrinkle and even with having a child, they don’t stain. You have to buy these

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, held up to first wash, rayon sheets.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a queen set in ocean on sale for my daughter. They are very soft. You can definitely tell they are rayon; remember to use a dryer sheet to minimize build up of static electricity. They’ll be comfortable and great for my daughter. My one complaint was that one of the pillow cases had an open seam where the surger was doing finishing. It is small enough to stitch up myself; I’d rather keep the carbon footprint of all the shipping back and forth low than deal with exchanges, especially for a $25 sheet set of six.I also purchased king sets in ocean, tree moss green, salmon pink, tree and the light sea foam green color. I gave two sets to my mother and kept two for myself to try. They fit my deep king size mattress just fine, though I can see that if you have an *extra* deep mattress or a mattress with a topper on it, you could struggle with the fitted sheets.I gave four stars based on them being true to the description, true to color, soft, and coming out of the wash according to washing instructions as expected (intact, true to color, not wrinkled beyond recognition, etc). I knocked a star off based on the pillowcase seam in the Queen set.I will say that I have been a lifetime sleeper on supima sateen weave cotton sheets; the older style Kirkland brand packs that Costco used to sell before they changed up and the quality went down. I’ve been looking for sheets to replace the several sets I bought years ago there for what seems like forever now. With that said, like all humans, I am biased about my preferences to what I “like” in a sheet or deem “comfortable”. It can’t be summed up in a thread count, a buzzy marketing term, or a trend designed to manipulate an algorithm to draw traffic to a listing.For me, sheets need to:-Be soft, but not slick or slippery (bye bye satin, silk, etc). but not so soft it sticks to you (deuces microfiber, you stifling killer of sleep).-Have a gentle crispness that keeps them just on the cusp of looking as though they have been starched but haven’t been (No thanks, percale. No one deserves accidental rug burn from sheets).-Be quiet so that when you or your partner rustle or get up, it doesn’t sound like someone is *running at incredible speeds* while wearing a polyester track suit in bed.-machine wash reliably and well according to directions, including staying true to color (see ya later to all those too thinly weaved fabric and poorly sewn/dyed/manufactured sheets)-not be too hot or too cold 😂 which is a moving target for every human in existence for every part of their body based on the time of day and year.In other words, I like my sheets dynamic yet reliable. They should be able to insulate me my gently falling above me and around me, only tucking themselves in tightly if I force the issue. Maybe I want to cool my leg, arm, or head down? I should be able to just move a bit or flip my pillow to a spot that hasn’t been warmed by my body. Maybe I want one leg warm and one leg cold? One leg outside the covers totally 👍🏻.Jersey sheets cannot accomplish this feat. Microfiber sheets also cannot accomplish this feat. It’s synthetic, and it’s like a creeping, stifling, too soft carpet that is trying to be too accommodating and creating an inescapable horror “comfort” where you have no choices. No, Jigsaw. I don’t want to play a game! I just wanted to sleep! Get outta my bed and outta my room!Regular cotton sheets are too loud, too crisp, not soft enough.And then! There is the ecological problem. The thing is, if you find good quality sheets that you like and you take care of them, they’ll last a very, very long time. I paid I think $55 per set for the Kirkland sateen supima cotton sheet sets that I’ve been cycling through for 15+ years. I had 7 sets. I’m down to 4. I’ve purchased a few other sets here and there to try them out. Always the highly rated ones, always after reading loads of reviews. You can probably infer from my comments above how that has turned out this far. The less we consume, the lower carbon footprint we leave. Little choices every day made by all of us adds up. Find a good, quality product and take good care of it. It will prevent you from the need to spend money over and over again.With that said, I have not yet had a chance to sleep in these sheets. They are rayon (synthetic) derived from bamboo. I’m hopeful but not blind. I am also exceedingly objective when it comes to writing reviews. I know what I purchased and I don’t expect them to be sateen. When I do sleep in them, I’ll update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Luxurious
reviews.reviewText: I feel much fancier when I’m rotting in bed now thanks to these soft, smooth sheets. Super comfy and cozy, and they help me to feel less hot when I’m sleeping. My only complaint is that the color I ordered was not what I was expecting. I should’ve known by the name “butter” that they would look more yellow, but in the pictures they looked very beige. It’s still a nice color though, and matches well with my green comforter. Ultimately I am satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft with excellent pillow cases!
reviews.reviewText: These are great sheets! I love how soft they are and that the pillow covers are big enough for big pillows and that they are the enclosed type that you see in hotels. And there’s four of them! The pillow cases are the best part in my opinion. And I also like that the fitted sheet fits my mattress easily and perfectly because I have a pillow top mattress and use a thick mattress cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant Color and Soft Texture
reviews.reviewText: Looks exactly like the picture, no scams. It's a bit wrinkled but I also did not wash it upon receiving it so that's probably my fault. Very comfortable (not too hot or cold, did not sweat through night). Overall I very much recommend these sheets for anyone wanting a nice pop of color in their bedding. 10/10 Recommend for people who like vibrancy.

reviews.reviewTitle: These sheets are not icy when you climb into bed!
reviews.reviewText: Soft and warm, they feel like an old friend. The colors are very pretty. The sizing is perfect for my king size bed.

reviews.reviewerName: MC Sydney Australia MC Sydney Australia
reviews.reviewTitle: Love them! Great choice of colours as well.
reviews.reviewText: Really comfortable to sleep in. Good value for money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as good as I expected
reviews.reviewText: Thinner and I believe a bit misleading in the way it says bamboo. I have bamboo sheets and they are heavy and cool and shiny. These feel cheap.Nice colour though

These sheets are so soft! I got the Salmon colour and they are exactly like the picture. I had gone to four stores in my city and all of the sheets were terrible and not soft…these ones however are amazing!

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing sheets ! Love them and recommend !
reviews.reviewText: This sheet set is amazing, and high quality. Sweet value for your money . I definitely recommend this -10/10 will purchase more
